price: それとも、われら*は彼らが立ち会う中、天使*を女として創ったのか？
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِنَٰثٗا وَهُمۡ شَٰهِدُونَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: am khalaqnā al-malāikata ināthan wahum shāhidūna
